attributes.action: change the official working day to 10am - 3pm during the months of December, January and February.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rather than mess about with the clocks every winter, which confuses people and makes them dizzy, lets just shorten the working day. This will a) prevent school children and workers from walking in the dark, b)give everyone the chance to be more social in the grimmer months thus enhancing the chances for peace and reducing crime and c)reduce the strain on the NHS by minimizing cases of depression caused by S.A.D.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
